Use AlbumArtist tag Use the AlbumArtist tag for the artist list (This method is slower and may result in erroneous artist images).
Use ArtistSort tag Use the ArtistSort tag (or AlbumartistSort) if the server provides the tag.
Use tags in file browser Use tags in file browser instead of filenames if available. Disable this option to show filenames in file browser.

Show notification Show a notification when leaving the main user interface. This is necessary for the widget to work. If you click on \'connect\' on the widget, the notification will be shown in any case.

Clear artist images Removes all saved images for artists. Clear album images Removes all saved images for albums.
Clear blocked artist images Removes all entries for artists that where searched for but not found. Clear blocked album images Removes all entries for albums that where searched for but not found.
Try to load all images for your database. This will load a lot of images. Be warned this will take some time. It might result in a temporary rate limit of the provider.
Only use WIFI for downloading Artwork downloading will only take place if the device is connected via WIFI.

No profiles found This application is a remote control for MPD. If you don\'t know MPD this application is probably useless for you, sorry :).\n\nTo use this application add a new profile with a add button in the upper right corner.\nThis application may or may not work with Mopidy as this is an MPD client, no support provided for Mopidy.\n\nIf you would like an music player based on the same interface, try Odyssey (https://github.com/gateship-one/odyssey).
Image download Downloading a large amount of images puts heavy load on the servers of the service you chose. It may occur that a server load prevents downloading of images. The downloader will then cancel its action if it detects an overload.\n\nPlease consider donating to the artwork services.
Artwork provided by: Big thanks to Frederik LÃ¼tkes for his continuous pressure to develop Odyssey, a music player on which this GUI is based on. This application is licensed under the GPLv3 license.\nMaterial icons are licensed under the CC-BY license by Google. The source code is available on GitHub:\nhttps://github.com/gateship-one/malp Version:
https://www.musicbrainz.org https://www.last.fm https://fanart.tv https://github.com/gateship-one/malp/wiki/FAQ
